properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 1 at 2:23PM PST until January 3 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas 18 to 20 feet at 19 seconds. For the Small Craft Advisory,
southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt Thursday
night and seas 12 to 17 feet at 19 seconds expected. For the
Gale Watch, south winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 47 kt and
seas building 16 to 21 feet at 14 seconds possible.

* WHERE...For hazardous seas, all areas. For small craft, all
areas. For Gale watch all areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 4 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST
Friday. For the Gale Watch, from Friday morning through Friday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
